{{Infobox battle item |name = Silk Scarf |image = [[File:Silk Scarf.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Silk Scarf''. |location =
*[[Silk Scarf#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Silk Scarf''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Normal_Type_icon.png|30px]] Normal type Pokémon. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 10%. == Acquisition == ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Lost Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Dark Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Connecting Cave|Legendary}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
